name: Ghost Runner (Chaleewt)
description:
Platform: Windows
Build: Unreal Engine 4 / C++ GAMEPLAY

A classic endless runner game with cute visual graphics developed for Windows. The player will play as a chubby ghost running through the game and collecting coins until you hit an obstacle with the point being to achieve the highest possible score.  Controls are simple, focusing on actions such as jumping over or sliding under obstacles. Increase difficulty over time, the game will be faster after you play for a while.  Hit the start button and Run!

CONTROL Move Left&Right: A, D Jump: Spacebar Slide: S SPECIAL THANKS

Devvy Character from @DevEnabled

NOTE

This project is one of my personal projects to practice and improve my game development skills. This project is not intended for commercial purposes.
